attributes.action: Implement a rational school year based around having 6 terms of 6 / 7 week periods;  for the benefit of all; in particular, through raising educational attainments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, the school year operates upon random term lengths up to 11 weeks long!  

Nationally implemented six school terms, of a maximum length of 6 / 7 weeks, offers a structured learning environment that would not tax children & teachers; yet maximises the learning environment: educational attainments would soar & sporting interests  enhanced.
 
All round all would benefit: Children with raised educational attainments + perceptively more time for sport and other interests; teachers & parents having structured term lengths plus, in addition to the summer break, having five 2 week vacation periods resulting in reduced holiday costs.
Industry would also benefit through the leisure side accommodating tourists over extended periods & commercially, a happier workforce.

Respect for the current religious holidays is maintained through having them off as 'school bank holidays' when they fall during term time. 

A win - win situation for all and at no extra cost, or increased resources.
